commands:
-- Gods -- Reload configurations ~Bugged~ -- Summon a NPC -- Open server -- Close server -- Set a player to house owner -- Add a decent skill level -- Add a blessing -- Talks for a player
-- Game Masters -- Summon a "wild" monster -- Changes looktype -- Summon a monster -- "/jail" CHANGE ACCESS AND INFO IN TALKACTIONS SCRIPT -- "/unjail" CHANGE ACCESS AND INFO IN TALKACTIONS SCRIPT
-- Counsellors -- IP BAN a player -- Ban a player -- Teleport to your temple -- Info about house of a player -- Info about who are banished -- Go to your town -- Cast Server save -- Teleport a floor up -- Broadcast to players in colors -- Teleport a floor down -- Send a player to a decent position -- Execute a raid -- Shutdown the Server -- Give someone a premium account -- Create a item by ID -- Create a item by name -- Teleport to players, creatures or NPCs -- Teleport by SQMs -- Kick a player -- Change world type -- Teleport a player -- Teleport a player -- Go totally invisible -- Clean the map
-- Senior Tutors
-- Check your money -- Check effects
-- Tutors -- -- Broacast message -- Info about a player -- Info about how many players are online -- Check all Multiclienting players
-- Players -- Sell your house to a player -- Buy a house -- Leave a house -- Show server information -- Show how many exp you need until the next level -- Show how mana you need to spent until the next magic level -- Shows the amount of online players -- report a bug to the Hoster -- Shows the server's uptime -- Shows how many frags the player has -- "/dive" Allows user to enter underwater areas while wearing helmet of the deep
